answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Yvette - I've included Ron Pellegrini's contact information below that I suggest you/Sunnyvale contact.  I used Pellegrini & Assoc. when I was the Telecommunication's Director at the City of Concord and can recommend them without reservation.  They are a Bay Area firm:
Ron Pellegrini 
Pellegrini Associates
925-516-1006 (voice)
510-326-8600 (cell)
ron_pellegrini@hotmail.com

author: Yvette Blackford
text: The City of Sunnyvale is looking for a telephone bill management solution. Each month, we receive a 500 page bill from AT&T detailing every call made. The bill is sorted by date; it is a tedious task for each department to review ALL 500 pages looking for their extensions. Any details on your agency’s off-the-shelf or in-house solutions would be wonderful!
title: Telephone Bill Management Solution - need one!
